attributes.action: Bring back our Troops from Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many times are we watching our troops coming back throught Wootten Bassett to crowds and tears and watching the program "wounded" well its to much , we need to bring our soldiers back home to their families as they are being killed and ripped to pieces and for what we have not been shown any reason for them to suffer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
